name: Combo Mania (Dayen Creation)
description:
Made for one button game jam.

The button is J!!!!! 

Control is given in-game.

Survive the game as long as you can...

Enemy Stats:

- Blue ( fast, 1 shot )

- Red ( Slow, 3 shot)

- Yellow ( Slow, 1 shot, 1 shot on each bullets)

Power-Ups:

- Shield ( range - short, duration -10s)

- 360 Bullet Burst ( range - long, reload duration - 5s)

- 360 Slash ( range - medium-long, reload duration - 10s)
